Description.Text: Viva Wyndham V Samana is located on the northeast coast of the Dominican Republic in Las Terrenas, facing the beautiful beach of Cosn Bay on the Saman Peninsula. Las Terrenas town is nearby, approximately 10 minutes away and Samanas El Catey International Airport is only 20 minutes from the property. With its beachfront location and landscape of dense tropical vegetation, mountains and turquoise sea, it will surely delight your senses.
